amendment.description: To prohibit certain health care providers from providing non-Department health care services to veterans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4026 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4026 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Baldwin to Amendment SA 3896. (consideration: CR S3017-3018) To prohibit certain health care providers from providing non-Department health care services to veterans.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4026 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Baldwin to Amendment SA 3896.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4026 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
